posts.post_content:
Anyone got any t213-3s they are looking to sell?

email me at [url]rgutheil@gmail.com[/url]

thanks - Rob
picked up a couple, anyone else looking to sell any t213-3s?
there was a guy(...weiss?) on ebay selling boatloads of type 3's...most in bad condition...but he had a great selection when I bought a few from him a few years ago.  He will deal.

I'm selling this one, let me know if you're interested. 

[url=https://flic.kr/p/5r9Zfu][img]https://farm4.staticflickr.com/3083/2910092956_16a5c06a14_o.jpg[/img][/url]
Thanks, Rob, pleasure doing business with you.
